Author: Yoonhwan Woo \cite{Woo2013}
Approach: Maximal sub volumes; Midsurface Abstraction per cell

Author: Boussuge \cite{Boussuge2012} \cite{Boussuge2013} \cite{Boussuge2013a} \cite{Boussuge2014}
Approach: Construction history by decomposition. Cellular FR for Extrudes
Limitations: Only Extrudes. Parallel and Orthogonal connections only.

Author: Huawei Zhu \cite{Zhu2015}
Approach: Virtual Decomposition by Face Group method; classification of connections
Limitations: Decomposition not possible for complex shapes
